医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调梅毒自检的优点：方便、隐私和快速得出结果研究人员对梅毒自测（SST）的效用进行了荟萃分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-highlights-advantages-of-syphilis-self-testing-convenience-privacy-and-rapid-results.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-highlights-advantages-of-syphilis-self-testing-convenience-privacy-and-rapid-results.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f09f69b7-fa91-44d1-a490-e0684a837c62 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 11:14:00 -0400 Study highlights advantages of syphilis self-testing: convenience, privacy, and rapid results
研究揭示阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停与心血管疾病之间的关键机制研究人员发现，患有阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停的人由于血氧水平降低而增加心血管风险，这在很大程度上是由呼吸中断造成的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-reveals-key-mechanism-linking-obstructive-sleep-apnea-and-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-reveals-key-mechanism-linking-obstructive-sleep-apnea-and-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4afb472-57f8-470f-ad55-784117440292 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 11:10:32 -0400 Study reveals key mechanism linking obstructive sleep apnea and cardiovascular disease
研究揭示乳腺癌如何扩散到淋巴结淋巴结是人体抵御疾病的第一道防线之一。这些生物警察站派出免疫细胞来击退入侵者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-sheds-light-on-how-breast-cancer-spreads-to-lymph-nodes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Study-sheds-light-on-how-breast-cancer-spreads-to-lymph-nodes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e54acf4-d219-4088-9871-5003df61a842 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 11:05:26 -0400 Study sheds light on how breast cancer spreads to lymph nodes
科罗拉多州儿童医院宣布成立精准医学研究所科罗拉多儿童医院（Children's Colorado）今天宣布成立精准医学研究所，这将使专家能够更有效地将精准医学融入到整个医院为患者提供的护理中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Childrens-Colorado-announces-launch-of-the-Precision-Medicine-Institute.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Childrens-Colorado-announces-launch-of-the-Precision-Medicine-Institute.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d210e07d-27eb-456e-a98d-c551455c7c05 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 11:00:00 -0400 Children's Colorado announces launch of the Precision Medicine Institute
MD 安德森和 Nexo Therapeutics 合作，针对以前无法成药的靶点推进新的癌症疗法德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心和 Nexo Therapeutics 今天宣布了一项多年战略合作，该合作将在药物发现和开发的最早阶段协调每个组织的创新技术和能力，以针对以前无法成药的目标快速推进有影响力的新癌症疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/MD-Anderson-and-Nexo-Therapeutics-partner-to-advance-new-cancer-therapies-against-previously-undruggable-targets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/MD-Anderson-and-Nexo-Therapeutics-partner-to-advance-new-cancer-therapies-against-previously-undruggable-targets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49c1e5e6-fa09-4554-a231-15befb276dbf Wed, 26 Jul 2023 10:57:12 -0400 MD Anderson and Nexo Therapeutics partner to advance new cancer therapies against previously undruggable targets
补充姜黄对代谢综合征和糖尿病患者的影响研究评估了补充姜黄对代谢综合征患者葡萄糖代谢的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Effects-of-turmeric-supplementation-in-individuals-with-metabolic-syndrome-and-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Effects-of-turmeric-supplementation-in-individuals-with-metabolic-syndrome-and-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=291569b9-b691-4850-9e17-e9ecdb659eca Wed, 26 Jul 2023 10:39:00 -0400 Effects of turmeric supplementation in individuals with metabolic syndrome and diabetes
地中海饮食可以改善住院老年人对体育锻炼的反应不遵循地中海饮食的住院老年人可以从体育锻炼计划中受益，以防止住院相关的残疾，即日常生活活动技能的丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Mediterranean-diet-may-improve-response-to-physical-exercise-in-hospitalized-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Mediterranean-diet-may-improve-response-to-physical-exercise-in-hospitalized-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26b22c41-abf3-41eb-8bab-40054c17da26 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 10:32:10 -0400 Mediterranean diet may improve response to physical exercise in hospitalized older adults
研究揭示了对 COVID-19 后综合症 (PCS) 表型及其对生活质量影响的新见解研究人员评估了 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 综合征 (PCS) 的患病率和严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Research-uncovers-new-insights-into-post-COVID-19-syndrome-(PCS)-phenotypes-and-impact-on-quality-of-生活.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Research-uncovers-new-insights-into-post-COVID-19-syndrome-(PCS)-phenotypes-and-impact-on-quality-of- life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbecde50-623a-409e-9611-36b3a03462fe Wed, 26 Jul 2023 10:23:00 -0400 Research uncovers new insights into post-COVID-19 syndrome (PCS) phenotypes and impact on quality of life
疼痛诊所连锁店支付 1140 万美元以解决医疗保险和医疗补助欺诈索赔加州最大的疼痛管理连锁诊所之一的所有者已同意向加州、俄勒冈州和联邦政府支付近 1140 万美元，以和解医疗保险和医疗补助欺诈指控。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Pain-clinic-chain-to-pay-24114M-to-settle-Medicare-and-Medicaid-fraud-claims.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/Pain-clinic-chain-to-pay-24114M-to-settle-Medicare-and-Medicaid-fraud-claims.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91dc049c-aa73-4286-8354-7e9a61ba5c90 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 06:59:37 -0400 Pain clinic chain to pay $11.4M to settle Medicare and Medicaid fraud claims
988 一年：什么有效？未来面临哪些挑战？自杀与危机生命热线的 988 热线本月迎来了一周年的里程碑。心理健康专家表示，这个三位数的数字使帮助比以前更容易获得。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/A-year-with-988-What-worked-What-c​​hallenges-lie-ahead.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230726/A-year-with-988-What-worked-What-c​​hallenges-lie-ahead.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67e1df30-01d8-46d1-b0ad-f8c00e4bca06 Wed, 26 Jul 2023 06:58:19 -0400 A year with 988: What worked? What challenges lie ahead?
